page.title: 15EMPLOYMENT IN AYLESBURY
page.content: Interview with a taxi driver. Q. What {company} do you work for? A. Fosters. Q. How many days a week do you work? A. 5,6,7. Q. How many hours a day do you work? A. 8 hours plus overtime. Q. Do you have one car to last you all year? A. yes. Q. What type of car do you drive? A. Mercedes Benz. Q. What is the furthest you have ever travelled? A. 300 miles. Q. Do you enjoy your job? A. Yes, very much. Q. How long have you been with this company? A. 3 years. There are many more jobs in {service industries} in Aylesbury. Light and manufacturing industry is concentrated on {industrial estates} and there is a considerable {traffic} problem at peak hours.
